General.Name: Jiuzi Holdings Inc
General.Description: Jiuzi Holdings, Inc., through its subsidiary, Zhejiang Jiuzi New Energy Vehicles Co., Ltd., franchises and operates retail stores under the Jiuzi brand that sell new energy vehicles, plug-in electric vehicles, and related components and parts in the People's Republic of China. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Hangzhou, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No.168 Qianjiang Nongchang Gengwen Road, Hangzhou, China, 310000
